alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 9:56PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River near Kindred affecting Richland and Cass Counties. Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo affecting Cass County. Maple River near Enderlin affecting Cass and Ransom Counties. Goose River at Hillsboro affecting Traill County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sheyenne River at Harwood. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 91.8 feet, County Road 22 and Rivershore Drive is closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 85.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 PM CDT Wednesday was 85.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 91.5 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 84.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
